general.a: We operate on a Zero-Compromise 'Sharp Tech' philosophy. We engineer authoritative AI agents and precision-built digital systems rather than templates.

general.q: Do you only make dark high-tech designs?
general.a: No. We design for your brand identity. Sharp-Tech is our signature, but we work with any palette if it maintains clarity and structure.

ai_automation.a: We convert generalist AI into authoritative brand experts using RAG-based training on your institutional data, ensuring zero hallucinations.

ai_automation.q: Can your AI handle complex tasks?
ai_automation.a: Yes. It can integrate with your systems to handle bookings, inventory lookups, and automated workflows.

design.q: Your designs are sharp and futuristic. What if my brand is traditional?
design.a: Our design philosophy adapts to any brand identity, while maintaining premium structure and clarity.

management.q: Can you finish a project in 2 weeks?
management.a: We can deliver an MVP-first rapid launch while avoiding quality trade-offs or technical debt.

post_launch.q: What if something breaks after launch?
post_launch.a: We offer ongoing support under our 'Pour the Wine' programâ€”continuous monitoring, stability patches, and AI retraining.
